name: test_simple_chat_responses[desktop-testdata4]
description:
Validate chatbot responses semantically using OpenAI embeddings.
    Also validate multilingual behavior: English (LTR) and Arabic (RTL).
descriptionHtml:
Validate chatbot responses semantically using OpenAI embeddings.
Also validate multilingual behavior: English (LTR) and Arabic (RTL).

parameters.name: testdata
parameters.value: {'prompt_en': 'What is your name?', 'expected_en': 'My name is GovGPT, your government information assistant.'}
